Common.Highlight.Common.Text: First Time Ever Offered to the Market

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
AUCTION: TUESDAY, 27 JULY at 10:30am at 
AuctionWORKS - Mezzanine Level, 50 Margaret St, Sydney NSW 2000 (Online Bidding Available).

DECEASED ESTATE

Being offered for the first time, CBRE presents to market 81 & 81a Birriga Road, Bellevue Hill. It is a once in a lifetime opportunity.

Commanding a prominent corner location, the two blocks boast a total of 21 apartments across three levels, comprising of:
• 18 x 2 bedroom units
• 3 x 4 bedroom apartments 
• 5 independent secure garages 

All the apartments are well proportioned and with abundant natural light, providing the prospective purchaser with a secure residential investment with a steady cash flow in the highly sought-after Eastern Suburbs neighbourhood. 

These solidly built properties present the ability to further capitalise through value-adding or strata subdividing. 

The R3 Medium Density Residential zoning and favourable corner location of the properties also provides an opportunity for a new luxury development (STCA). 

With its positioning in the exclusive Eastern Suburbs, the property will appeal to local affluent downsizers who are looking for apartments in a central location. 

Bellevue Hill has capitalised on the area’s secure residential market and has experienced substantial growth over the past five years. The suburb is renowned for its high-end real estate and prestigious residential market, landscaped gardens, rolling lawns and grand estate homes. 

Bellevue Hill is an exclusive suburb in Sydney’s East, bounded by Bondi, Bondi Junction and Woollahra. It is just 5km* from Sydney CBD and 1.9 km* from the world-famous Bondi Beach. 

Key Property Highlights: 
-Total of 21 apartments, consisting of 2 and 4 bedrooms + 5 garages
- Substantial corner site area of 1,342sqm*, allowing for strong sunlight & ventilation
- Significant landmark residential investment in one of Sydney's most affluent suburbs
- central location close to Bondi Beach, Bondi Junction, Rose Bay and Double Bay 
- Ability to add value, sell down or hold as a secure investment  

*Approximate

81 & 81a Birriga Road, Bellevue Hill will be sold via Public Auction on Tuesday, 27 July 2021 at 10:30am at AuctionWORKS.
Address: Mezzanine Level, 50 Margaret St, Sydney NSW 2000 (Online Bidding Available).

Inspections to be held by appointment as per COVID-19 Greater Sydney restriction requirements. Please enquire directly with the exclusive agents to arrange a private viewing. 

To assist in the assessment of this offering, due diligence can be obtained from the exclusive selling agents.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: TWO APARTMENT BLOCKS IN-ONE-LINE IN EXCLUSIVE EASTERN SUBURBS LOCATION

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
CBRE, as the exclusive selling agent, is please to present a unique opportunity to purchase the estate at 206D Victoria Road, Bellevue Hill. First time offered to market, the site is located in Sydney’s prestigious Eastern Suburbs and enjoys elevated, uninterrupted views overlooking Double Bay’s Cooper Park. This property offers a development opportunity not frequently offered to the market.

Property highlights include:

- Large site area: 1,408sqm^
- Elevated north facing position with uninterrupted view over Cooper Park, Double Bay
- Setback from main roads, hideaway tranquil location
- Ideal for conversion or knock down and rebuild to high end luxury apartments
- Planning controls: R3 Medium Density Zone, FSR 1.3:1, Height limit 13.5m
- Current improvements: 6 x 2 bed & 2 x 3 bed apartments with 10 car spaces
- Close proximity to Bondi Beach, Bondi Junction & Double Bay

206d Victoria Road, Bellevue Hill will be made available for sale via expression of interest closing on Wednesday, 16 August 2017 at 4.30pm (AEST)

^Approximate

For further information please contact the exclusive CBRE selling agents listed.

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Total of 4 x 2 ½ Bedroom Apartments

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
DECEASED ESTATE 

Being offered for the first time, CBRE presents to market 14 Lennox Street, Bellevue Hill.

14 Lennox Street, Bellevue Hill is a deceased estate, comprising an existing two-storey building of 4 x 2 ½ bedroom apartments with 4 x lock up garages and an enclosed storage shed. The property sits on a generous level site area of 704sqm* which is North-East facing offering abundant sunlight throughout the day. Located on a quiet and tranquil street in Bellevue Hill moments from shops, prestigious schools, and transport, this property provides incoming purchasers with a rare opportunity to acquire a significant residential investment awaiting imminent value-add improvement. 

The property has been well maintained and enjoys generous floor to ceiling heights across all apartments. Also benefitting from rare dual driveways on both sides of the property providing fantastic drive through access. 

14 Lennox Street presents a diverse opportunity to prospective purchasers to secure a safe residential investment with significant value-add potential. Whether it be capitalising on the existing apartment block use by selling down through strata subdividing, or building your own dream home; duplexes, or semi-detached dwellings (STCA) which are permissible under the current planning controls. 14 Lennox Street is a rare opportunity that provides multiple value-add potential in Sydney’s exclusive Eastern Suburbs.

14 Lennox Street, Bellevue Hill benefits from the following key attributes:

•Deceased estate
•First time offered to the market
•Existing improvements of 4 x 2 ½ bedroom apartments
•4 x lock up garages with enclosed storage shed
•Significant land area of 704sqm*
•Large existing internal building area of 391sqm* 
•Potential to capitalise on existing use right of 4 residential apartments 
•Ability to add value, sell down, or build your own dream home/duplex's on a well maintained and level block
•R2 Low Density Residential zoning (permitting dwelling/semi-detached dwellings/dual occupancies) 
•9.5m height of building 
•Dual driveway with drive through access to either side of the property
•Central location close to Bondi Beach, Bondi Junction, Rose Bay, and Double Bay
•Elevated views over Bellevue Hill and North-East facing providing sunlight throughout the day
•Situated in a quiet and tranquil locality and moments from prestigious schools, parks, retail, transport, and beaches.     

14 Lennox Street, Bellevue Hill will be sold via an online Public Auction at auctionWORKS on Tuesday 17 August 2021 at 10:30am (registration, livestream & online bidding will be available)

Inspections to be held by appointment as per COVID-19 Greater Sydney restriction requirements. Please enquire directly with the exclusive agents to arrange a private viewing.

For more information or to request access to the due diligence room, please contact the exclusive selling agents.

*Approx

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: DECEASED ESTATE APARTMENT BLOCK/BUILD YOUR DREAM HOME/DUPLEX’S
